creator: lachiewicz@plusnet.pl
text:
last parameter "r" is ignored

http://localhost/servlet/SnoopServlet?service=&e=x&r

Error: 500
Location: /servlet/SnoopServlet
Internal Servlet Error:

java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException
	at java.lang.System.arraycopy(Native Method)
	at org.apache.tomcat.util.buf.CharChunk.append(CharChunk.java:271)
	at org.apache.tomcat.util.http.Parameters.processParameters
(Parameters.java:430)
	at org.apache.tomcat.util.http.Parameters.processParameters
(Parameters.java:467)
	at org.apache.tomcat.util.http.Parameters.handleQueryParameters
(Parameters.java:278)
	at org.apache.tomcat.core.Request.handleQueryParameters
(Request.java:453)
	at org.apache.tomcat.facade.HttpServletRequestFacade.getParameterNames
(HttpServletRequestFacade.java:275)
	at SnoopServlet.doGet(SnoopServlet.java:79)
	at javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet.service(HttpServlet.java)
	at javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet.service(HttpServlet.java)
	at org.apache.tomcat.facade.ServletHandler.doService
(ServletHandler.java:500)
	at org.apache.tomcat.core.Handler.invoke(Handler.java:322)
	at org.apache.tomcat.core.Handler.service(Handler.java:235)
	at org.apache.tomcat.facade.ServletHandler.service
(ServletHandler.java:448)
	at org.apache.tomcat.core.ContextManager.internalService
(ContextManager.java:918)
	at org.apache.tomcat.core.ContextManager.service
(ContextManager.java:831)
	at org.apache.tomcat.modules.server.Ajp12Interceptor.processConnection
(Ajp12Interceptor.java:207)
	at org.apache.tomcat.util.net.TcpWorkerThread.runIt
(PoolTcpEndpoint.java:477)
	at org.apache.tomcat.util.threads.ThreadPool$ControlRunnable.run
(ThreadPool.java:517)
	at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:484)

This has been fixed.

creator: Larry.Isaacs@sas.com
